sections.title: Why Progression Matters
sections.text: Progression gives players a sense of advancement and development. Without clear progression, many players quickly lose interest.

items.text: Vertical Progression: The player becomes directly stronger - higher stats, more damage, better equipment. Clearly measurable and satisfying.
Horizontal Progression: The player gains more options and variety - new abilities, playstyles, and strategies. Increases game depth.
Cosmetic Progression: Visual customization without gameplay impact - skins, emotes, effects. Important for long-term motivation.

sections.title: Design Tips
sections.text:
• Early Rewards: Level up more frequently at the start
  • Multiple Paths: Offer different ways to progress
  • Transparency: Show clearly what the next step is
  • Meaningful Rewards: Every level should feel valuable
